(default)
Class CefDragHandler

CefBase
   |
   +--CefDragHandler
   in cef_drag_handler.h
class CefDragHandler
extends CefBase

Implement this interface to handle events related to dragging. The methods of this class will be called on the UI thread.

Inner Classes, Typedefs, and Enums
typedef CefDragHandler::DragOperationsMask
          
 
Method Summary
 virtual bool OnDragEnter( CefRefPtr< CefBrowser > browser, CefRefPtr< CefDragData > dragData, CefDragHandler::DragOperationsMask mask )
          Called when an external drag event enters the browser window.
 virtual bool OnDragStart( CefRefPtr< CefBrowser > browser, CefRefPtr< CefDragData > dragData, CefDragHandler::DragOperationsMask mask )
          Called when the browser window initiates a drag event.
   
Methods inherited from class CefBase
AddRef, Release, GetRefCt
 

Method Detail

OnDragEnter

public virtual bool OnDragEnter( CefRefPtr< CefBrowser > browser, CefRefPtr< CefDragData > dragData, CefDragHandler::DragOperationsMask mask );
Called when an external drag event enters the browser window. |dragData| contains the drag event data and |mask| represents the type of drag operation. Return false for default drag handling behavior or true to cancel the drag event.

OnDragStart

public virtual bool OnDragStart( CefRefPtr< CefBrowser > browser, CefRefPtr< CefDragData > dragData, CefDragHandler::DragOperationsMask mask );
Called when the browser window initiates a drag event. |dragData| contains the drag event data and |mask| represents the type of drag operation. Return false for default drag handling behavior or true to cancel the drag event.
